_header: Children of Eve both great and small
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary in James Ryman’s songbook — six stanzas rhyme royal with refrain (ababbcc), ‘Maria spes nostra salue’, and burden (cc): ‘Mekely we syng and seye to the / Maria spes nostra salue’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Childryn of eve bothe grete and smallHere in this vale of
                    wrechidnesse…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Sith we do sing and seye to theMaria spes nostra
                    salue
